User Stories.User Story: As a retail banking user, I want to make UPI payments securely using two-factor authentication, receive real-time payment notifications, and have my session timed out after 5 minutes of inactivity, so that I can confidently transact and manage my finances on the go, considering I'm an expert user who values speed and security, but sometimes faces issues like failed transactions during peak hours or wallet balance update delays.
Acceptance Criteria: Complete UPI transactions with two-factor authentication
Provide a secure session timeout after 5 minutes of inactivity

Functional: Failed UPI transactions during peak hours
Non-Functional: Inconsistent user interface for payment confirmation
Insufficient error handling for declined transactions

User Stories.User Story: As a banking user, I want to use UPI payments for convenient transactions, with real-time notifications and secure session management, considering I'm a casual user who wants ease of use but might encounter some connectivity issues or payment processing delays.
Acceptance Criteria: Complete UPI transactions with two-factor authentication

User Stories.User Story: I want to make payments using UPI for simple transactions, with basic security and notification features, as a novice user who prioritizes ease of use.
